## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
library(dplyr)
```



```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count), data = pf) + 
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count), data = pf) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = 1/20) +
  xlim (13, 90)
```
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count), data = pf) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20) +
  xlim (13, 90) +
  coord_trans(y="sqrt")
```
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count), data = pf) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0)) +
  xlim (13, 90) +
  coord_trans(y="sqrt")
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friendships_initiated), data = pf)  + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0)) +
  xlim (13, 90) +
  coord_trans(y="sqrt")
```

```{r}
age_groups <- group_by(pf,age)

pf.fc_by_age <- summarise(age_groups, 
          friend_count_mean = mean(friend_count),
          friend_count_median = median(friend_count),
          n = n())

pf.fc_by_age <- arrange(pf.fc_by_age, age)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count_mean), data = pf.fc_by_age) + 
  geom_line()+
  xlim (13, 90)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friendships_initiated), data = pf)  + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0), color = 'orange') +
  xlim (13, 90) +
  coord_trans(y="sqrt")+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=mean)+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.1), linetype=2, color="blue")+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.9), linetype=2, color="blue")+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.5), color="blue")
```
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count), data = pf) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1000), xlim = c(13,70)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0), color = 'orange') +
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=mean)+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.1), linetype=2, color="blue")+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.9), linetype=2, color="blue")+
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=quantile, fun.args=list(probs=0.5), color="blue")
```


```{r}
cor.test(pf$age,pf$friend_count,method = "pearson")
```

```{r}
with(subset(pf, age<=70), cor.test(age,friend_count))
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = www_likes_received, y = likes_received), data = pf) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0)) +
  xlim (NA, quantile(pf$www_likes_received, .95)) +
  ylim (NA, quantile(pf$likes_received, .95)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", color = "red")
```

```{r}
library(alr3)
data(Mitchell)
?Mitchell

```
```{r}

ggplot(aes(x = Month, y = Temp), data = Mitchell) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_discrete(breaks = seq(0,203,11))
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x=(Month%%12),y=Temp),data=Mitchell)+ 
  geom_point() 

```

```{r}
pf$age_with_months <- pf$age + (12-pf$dob_month)/12
```

```{r}
age_months_groups <- group_by(pf,age_with_months)

pf.fc_by_age_months <- summarise(age_months_groups, 
          friend_count_mean = mean(friend_count),
          friend_count_median = median(friend_count),
          n = n())

pf.fc_by_age_months <- arrange(pf.fc_by_age_months, age_with_months)
```

```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = age_with_months, y = friend_count), data = pf) +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 1000), xlim = c(13,70)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 1/20, position=position_jitter(h=0), color = 'orange') +
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=mean)
```


```{r}

plot_month <- ggplot(aes(x = age_with_months, y = friend_count_mean),
  data = subset(pf.fc_by_age_months, age_with_months<71) )+
  geom_line()+
  geom_smooth()
plot_age <- ggplot(aes(x = age, y = friend_count_mean),
  data = subset(pf.fc_by_age, age<71) )+
  geom_line()+
  geom_smooth()
plot_smooth <- ggplot(aes(x = round(age/5)*5, y = friend_count), data = subset(pf, age<71)) +
  geom_line(stat="summary", fun.y=mean)
grid.arrange(plot_month, plot_age, plot_smooth, ncol=1)


```
